name: Upsert Tool Definition
description: Create or update a tool's JSON definition file in definitions/[category]/[name].json

category.description: Tool category (data, agent, task, time, web, tools, workflows, storage, etc.)

description.description: Human-readable description of what this tool does

parameters.description: JSON Schema for tool parameters (must have type: 'object')

target_space.description: Optional target space for space-specific tool
